message: Bob, I believe this product presents a unique opportunity and is worth a significant investment.  I'm offering it to you at $1,500,000.  I'm confident its value will become even clearer as we discuss the details further.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $1,200,000 is below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,350,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1,350,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $1,150,000 for the product.
